p.span: All Fonda-Fultonville schools are closed through at least May 15 due to the ongoing COVID-19 public health situation.
Important Notices | At-Home Learning | To-Go Meals for Students | Childcare for Emergency Workers

div.div:
School Closure Updates and Resources
Get all current status updates regarding COVID-19 here.

Phase 2 of the PK-12 at-home learning plan is available
Phase 2 of our at-home learning plan starts April 20

img.alt: two pancakes on a plate with a smear of maple syrup that looks like a smiley face

div.div:
To-go meals for all students available on weekdays
A station will be set up in the high school vestibule from 9:30-11:30 a.m.
